word: "SINCE OUR RETURN FROM SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA, MOTHER HAS BEEN WEAK AND WEARY, AND I DID NOT PLACE THIS LETTER IN HER HANDS UNTIL YESTERDAY. THEN SHE READ IT ALL THROUGH, AND WHEN SHE RECALLED THE SAD EXPERIENCES THROUGH WHICH BROTHER E HAS PASSED, SHE FELT VERY SORRY FOR HIM AND FOR OUR BRETHREN WHOSE HEARTS HAVE BEEN MADE SAD THROUGH THE PAST YEARS BY HIS WEAK AND WICKED COURSE.
